narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Chow Counseling Family Services is a Counselor, Professional provider based in Avondale, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $12.6M in Medicaid payments across 18K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $12.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
